content:
MarkupCompilePass1 Class

In this Article

Implements the MarkupCompilePass1 task. Use the MarkupCompilePass1 element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see MarkupCompilePass1.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class MarkupCompilePass1 : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task
  • MarkupCompilePass1

Inherited Members

Constructors summary

MarkupCompilePass1()

Initializes a new instance of the MarkupCompilePass1 class.

Properties summary

AllGeneratedFiles

Gets or sets a list of files that are generated by the markup compiler.
AlwaysCompileMarkupFilesInSeparateDomain

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to run the compilation in second application domain.
ApplicationMarkup

Gets or sets the name of the application definition XAML file.
AssembliesGeneratedDuringBuild

Gets or sets a list of reference assemblies that change during the build cycle.
AssemblyName

Gets or sets the short name of assembly that will be generated for this project.
AssemblyPublicKeyToken

Gets or sets the public key token of the assembly.
AssemblyVersion

Gets or sets the version of the assembly.
ContentFiles

Gets or sets a list of loose content files.
DefineConstants

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current value of DefineConstants is kept.
ExtraBuildControlFiles

Gets or sets a list of files that control whether a rebuild is triggered when the MarkupCompilePass1 task reruns; a rebuild is triggered if one of these files changes.
GeneratedBamlFiles

Gets or sets the generated binary XAML (BAML) files.
GeneratedCodeFiles

Gets or sets the list of generated managed code files.
GeneratedLocalizationFiles

Gets or sets the generated localization file for each localizable XAML file.
HostInBrowser

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the generated assembly is a XAML browser application (XBAP).
IsRunningInVisualStudio

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task is running in Visual Studio.
KnownReferencePaths

Gets or sets the paths of referenced assemblies that do not change during the build procedure.
Language

Gets or sets the managed language that the compiler supports.
LanguageSourceExtension

Gets or sets the extension that is appended to the extension of the generated managed code file.
LocalizationDirectivesToLocFile

Gets or sets a value that specifies how to generate localization information for each Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) file.
OutputPath

Gets or sets the location of generated code files.
OutputType

Gets or sets the output type of the assembly.
PageMarkup

Gets or sets a list of XAML files to process.
References

Gets or sets the assembly references.
RequirePass2ForMainAssembly

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the project contains non-localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded into the main assembly.
RequirePass2ForSatelliteAssembly

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the project contains localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded in the satellite assembly.
RootNamespace

Gets or sets the root namespace of the classes inside the project.
SourceCodeFiles

Gets or sets the source code file list for the current project.
SplashScreen

Gets or sets the splash screen image to be displayed before application initialization.
UICulture

Gets or sets a value that specifies which culture satellite assembly will hold the generated binary XAML (BAML) files.
XamlDebuggingInformation

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether diagnostic information is generated and included in the compiled XAML in order to aid debugging.

Methods summary

Execute()

Executes a task.

Constructors

  • MarkupCompilePass1()

    Initializes a new instance of the MarkupCompilePass1 class.

    public MarkupCompilePass1 ();

Properties

  • AllGeneratedFiles

    Gets or sets a list of files that are generated by the markup compiler.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] AllGeneratedFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of files that are generated by the markup compiler.

  • AlwaysCompileMarkupFilesInSeparateDomain

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to run the compilation in second application domain.

    public bool AlwaysCompileMarkupFilesInSeparateDomain { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to run the compilation in second application domain; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Setting this property to false results in faster compilation.

  • ApplicationMarkup

    Gets or sets the name of the application definition XAML file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ApplicationMarkup { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The name of the application definition XAML file.

  • AssembliesGeneratedDuringBuild

    Gets or sets a list of reference assemblies that change during the build cycle.

    public string[] AssembliesGeneratedDuringBuild { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The list of reference assemblies that change during the build cycle.

  • AssemblyName

    Gets or sets the short name of assembly that will be generated for this project.

    public string AssemblyName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The short name of assembly which will be generated for this project.

  • AssemblyPublicKeyToken

    Gets or sets the public key token of the assembly.

    public string AssemblyPublicKeyToken { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The public key token of the assembly.

  • AssemblyVersion

    Gets or sets the version of the assembly.

    public string AssemblyVersion { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The version of the assembly.

  • ContentFiles

    Gets or sets a list of loose content files.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ContentFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of loose content files.

  • DefineConstants

    Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current value of DefineConstants is kept.

    public string DefineConstants { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Specifies whether the current value of DefineConstants is kept, which affects target assembly generation; if this parameter is changed, the public API in the target assembly may be changed and the compilation of XAML files that reference local types may be affected.

  • ExtraBuildControlFiles

    Gets or sets a list of files that control whether a rebuild is triggered when the MarkupCompilePass1 task reruns; a rebuild is triggered if one of these files changes.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ExtraBuildControlFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of files that control whether a rebuild is triggered when the MarkupCompilePass1 task reruns; a rebuild is triggered if one of these files changes.

  • GeneratedBamlFiles

    Gets or sets the generated binary XAML (BAML) files.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] GeneratedBamlFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The generated binary XAML (BAML) files.

  • GeneratedCodeFiles

    Gets or sets the list of generated managed code files.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] GeneratedCodeFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The list of generated managed code files.

  • GeneratedLocalizationFiles

    Gets or sets the generated localization file for each localizable XAML file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] GeneratedLocalizationFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The generated localization file for each localizable XAML file.

  • HostInBrowser

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the generated assembly is a XAML browser application (XBAP).

    public string HostInBrowser { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      true if the generated assembly is a XAML browser application (XBAP); otherwise, false.

  • IsRunningInVisualStudio

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task is running in Visual Studio.

    public bool IsRunningInVisualStudio { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the task is running in Visual Studio; otherwise, false.

  • KnownReferencePaths

    Gets or sets the paths of referenced assemblies that do not change during the build procedure.

    public string[] KnownReferencePaths { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The paths of referenced assemblies that do not change during the build procedure.

  • Language

    Gets or sets the managed language that the compiler supports.

    public string Language { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The managed language that the compiler supports. The valid values are C#, VB, and C++.

  • LanguageSourceExtension

    Gets or sets the extension that is appended to the extension of the generated managed code file.

    public string LanguageSourceExtension { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The extension that is appended to the extension of the generated managed code file.

  • LocalizationDirectivesToLocFile

    Gets or sets a value that specifies how to generate localization information for each Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) file.

    public string LocalizationDirectivesToLocFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A value that specifies how to generate localization information for each Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) file. The valid values are None, CommentsOnly, and All.

  • OutputPath

    Gets or sets the location of generated code files.

    public string OutputPath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The location of generated code files.

  • OutputType

    Gets or sets the output type of the assembly.

    public string OutputType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The type of assembly that is generated by a project. The valid values are winexe, exe, library, and netmodule.

  • PageMarkup

    Gets or sets a list of XAML files to process.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] PageMarkup { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of XAML files to process.

  • References

    Gets or sets the assembly references.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] References { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The assembly references.

  • RequirePass2ForMainAssembly

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the project contains non-localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded into the main assembly.

    public bool RequirePass2ForMainAssembly { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if project contains non-localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded into the main assembly.; otherwise, false.

  • RequirePass2ForSatelliteAssembly

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the project contains localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded in the satellite assembly.

    public bool RequirePass2ForSatelliteAssembly { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the p project contains localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded in the satellite assembly; otherwise, false.

  • RootNamespace

    Gets or sets the root namespace of the classes inside the project.

    public string RootNamespace { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The root namespace of the classes inside the project.

  • SourceCodeFiles

    Gets or sets the source code file list for the current project.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] SourceCodeFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The source code file list for the current project.

  • SplashScreen

    Gets or sets the splash screen image to be displayed before application initialization.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] SplashScreen { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The splash screen image.

  • UICulture

    Gets or sets a value that specifies which culture satellite assembly will hold the generated binary XAML (BAML) files.

    public string UICulture { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A a value that specifies which culture satellite assembly will hold the generated binary XAML (BAML) files.

  • XamlDebuggingInformation

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether diagnostic information is generated and included in the compiled XAML in order to aid debugging.

    public bool XamlDebuggingInformation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if diagnostic information is generated and included in the compiled XAML in order to aid debugging; otherwise, false.

Methods

  • Execute()

    Executes a task.

    public override bool Execute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the task executed successfully; otherwise, false.
